hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash cd $HOME/HOME/MenuiserieBiaud; USER=menuiserav PASS=cT4FhegR9rhh HOST=ftp.cluster011.ovh.net
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=1 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/www -X www/.git
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f | true
WPNAME='MenuiserieBiaud' WPDBVERSION=`` WPPLUGIN=`` URL='http://www.menuiseriebiaud.com/' TYPE='' SERV='' FAVICON='http://www.menuiseriebiaud.com/images/5585856e-94ae-4740-b786-5aa4326cbcd3_page_logo' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@monit.aloa.ovh/RapportsMonitoring/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL&serveur=$SERV&favicon=$FAVICON"
